channel.title: CVE Feed for iovamihai -- Paid Membership Subscriptions – Effortless Memberships, Recurring Payments & Content Restriction
channel.description: The latest CVEs for iovamihai -- Paid Membership Subscriptions – Effortless Memberships, Recurring Payments & Content Restriction

item.title: CVE-2024-1390|2024-08-08T18:52:47.596Z -- iovamihai -- paid%20membership%20subscriptions%20%E2%80%93%20effortless%20memberships%2C%20recurring%20payments%20%26%20content%20restriction
item.description: The Paid Membership Subscriptions – Effortless Memberships, Recurring Payments & Content Restriction plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the creating_pricing_table_page function in all versions up to, and including, 2.11.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to create pricing tables.

item.title: CVE-2024-1389|2024-07-24T15:18:40.588Z -- iovamihai -- paid%20membership%20subscriptions%20%E2%80%93%20effortless%20memberships%2C%20recurring%20payments%20%26%20content%20restriction
item.description: The Paid Membership Subscriptions – Effortless Memberships, Recurring Payments & Content Restriction plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the pms_stripe_connect_handle_authorization_return function in all versions up to, and including, 2.11.1. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change the Stripe payment keys.

item.title: CVE-2024-1390|2024-02-20T18:56:19.872Z -- iovamihai -- paid%20membership%20subscriptions%20%E2%80%93%20effortless%20memberships%2C%20recurring%20payments%20%26%20content%20restriction
